name: LTA
author: Yui
description: Requires LazyLib. Requires MagicLib. Compatible with Nexerelin. Use Version Checker. A collection of lore-friendly and balance-friendly lowtech goodies to play with. Requires Magiclib. All credit for music goes to the original composers, links in LTA/sounds/LTA/music and LTA/sounds/LTA/fx/LTAweapons. Enjoy.
